column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of Nb5Ir3 and Nb5Ir3Ox were synthesized by the solid state reaction.
#Text=Stoichiometric amounts of Nb, Ir and Nb2O3 precursor powders were mixed and pressed into pellets before sealed in a quartz tube under vacuum of around 10−3 mbar.
#Text=The reaction was at 1200 °C for 72 h followed by a quenching process in either air or liquid nitrogen.
